index.name: lloyd-home-context
index.description: Machine-readable overview of /home/lloyd with key directories, commands, and environments.

overview.summary: Primary home folder for the Eidos research environment, containing personal assets, automation tools, and large Development workspaces.
last_notes: /home is mounted from /dev/nvme0n1p5 (199G total, ~186G used currently).
Bash is the default shell (see ~/.bashrc) and Python 3.12 is the system interpreter.
Scripts under ./scripts form the automation toolkit referenced throughout the workspace.
